Uses of Package
com.j2speed.async

Classes in com.j2speed.async used by com.j2speed.async
Async
          An asynchronous computation that can be executed on a specified AsyncRunner.
AsyncExecutor
          The Executor specialisation for use in and AsyncRunner.
AsyncRun
          Represents the current execution life cycle of an asynchronous computation.
AsyncRunner
          A runner for asynchronous operations.
CompletionAdapter
          An empty implementation adapter for CompletionHandlers.
CompletionHandler
          An ExceptionHandler that also handles the notification of the completion of a computation.
ExceptionAdapter
          An empty implementation adapter for ExceptionHandlers.
ExceptionHandler
          Handles the exception caught during the execution of an asynchronous computation.
Progress
          Represent the progress result notified to a ProgressHandler during the processing of a Progressive.
ProgressAdapter
          An adapter for the interface.
ProgressHandler
          It handles the values received during the execution of an asynchronous Progressive.
Progressive
          A request that can produce multiple instances of the specified type and we want the ability to process each one whenever it is ready.
ProgressState
          Notifies a progress handler of a progress.
Request
          A request that produce a value of the specified type.
ResponseAdapter
          An adapter for the interface
ResponseHandler
          It handles the value received as a result of the execution of an asynchronous Request .
Result
          Represent the result notified to a ResponseHandler during the processing of a Request.
State
          Allows the execution of an asynchronous computation to query the running status.
SyncRunner
          An "asynchronous" runner that uses the calling thread to execute the asyncs.
